b.batch_number bbatch_number, b.price bprice, b.channel_unit_price bchannel_unit_price, b.total_channel_price btotal_channel_price, b.num bnum, b.amount bamount, b.activity_apportionment d.original_line_code doriginal_line_code, d.total_count dtotal_count, d.actual_total_count dactual_total_count, d.return_total_count dreturn_total_count, d.product_date dproduct_date, d.batch_remark dbatch_remark, d.batch_code dbatch_code, d.lock_type dlock_type, d.supplier_code dsupplier_code, d.supplier_name dsupplier_name, d.batch_info_code dbatch_info_code, d.be_overdue_date dbe_overdue_date, d.create_time dcreate_time, d.update_time dupdate_time, d.create_by_id dcreate_by_id, d.update_by_id dupdate_by_id, d.create_by_name dcreate_by_name, d.update_by_name dupdate_by_name, e.sku_code esku_code, e.sku_name esku_name, e.warehouse_code ewarehouse_code, e.batch_code ebatch_code, e.total_count etotal_count from order_info a left join order_info_item b on a.order_code = b.order_code left join order_info_log c on c.order_code = a.order_code left join order_info_item_product_batch d on d.order_code = a.order_code left join order_info_item_batch_month e on e.order_code = a.order_code where a.order_code = #{orderCode}
